divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my kitchen window and thought i saw the moon but after looking out the other side of the house the moon was over there. i watched it for about 5 minutes and it just stayed in one spot. finally it just disappeared. i don't know what i saw but it just stayed in one spot and didn't move which seemed weird. and all of a sudden it disappeared.
Summary: I saw a bright light that was at a diagonal that stayed in one spot for 5 minutes and then just vanished
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dexter
There were no other sightings in Dexter on or around March 7th 2007
